posts.post_title: Frank Hankinson Old Judge For Sale Dotted Tie
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Kasarda
Dotted Tie Frank Hankinson trimmed, but not skinned. Graded GAI Authentic. Lists for 18,000. in near mint. My price is $900.
Scans available. Thanks Bruce Kasarda
